name: BizReview – Business and Google Place Review WordPress Plugin
author: ThemeAtelier

sections.description:
Bizreview Business and Google Place Review WordPress Plugin for display Google Reviews & Ratings to increase user confidence, SEO and traffic of your Business. This plugin help you to increase sales with social proof. This plguin has 14 different option to showcase your Google place reviews. There has option to generate shortcodes so you will able to use this shortcode in your pages, posts or anywhere you want in your WordPress website. The shortcode also can be use in any popular page builders like Gutenburg, Elementor or WpBekary. If you use elementor you have elementor widgets to use.

Check plugin demo | Documentation | Pro version

Features:

  • Displays 5 Google business reviews per location ( 5 review restricted by Google API )
  • Fetching Review Based on Google API
  • Google Place Information badges
  • 14 + review style
  • Review Slider
  • Review Grid
  • Review Masonary Grid
  • Review Elementor Widget support
  • Review Widget
  • Review Shortcode
  • Settings Options
  • Multipale Place review option
  • Use multiple times in a page.
  • Global Place review option
  • Rating Filtering option
  • Trim Long Reviews
  • Language support
  • SEO friendly
  • Well Online Documentation
  • SASS/SCSS Files included
  • Error Free
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘BizReview’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
BizReview 1.2
1. Code compitible with latest WordPress and PHP
2. Elementor widget added

BizReview 1.0
1. Initial release

BizReview 1.4.2
1. Compitible with WordPress 6.4.1
